climate.temperature: Average temperatures will continue to increase in all seasons (very high confidence), and more hot days and warm spells are projected (very high confidence).
climate.rainfall_and_drought: By late in the century, less rainfall is projected during the cool season, with high confidence. There is medium confidence that rainfall will remain unchanged in the warm season. Even though mean annual rainfall is projected to decline, heavy rainfall intensity is projected to increase, with high confidence. Time spent in drought is projected, with medium confidence, to increase over the course of the century.
climate.marine: Mean sea level will continue to rise and height of extreme sea-level events will also increase (very high confidence).
climate.fire: A harsher fire-weather climate in the future (high confidence).
